titleStmt.title: A cabinet of spirituall iewells wherein man's misery, God's mercy, Christ's treasury, truth's prevalency, errour's ignominy, grace's excellency, a Christian's duty, the saint's glory, is set forth in eight sermons : with a brief appendix, of the nature, equity, and obligation of tithes under the Gospell, and expediency of marriage to be solemnized onely by a lawfull minister ... / by John Cragge, M.A. ...
titleStmt.author: Cragge, John, M.A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for H. Twyford, N. Brooks, T. Dring, J. Place, and are to be sold at their shops,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Princeton Theological Seminary Library.
